name: Super Maze (Kageoni92)
description:
A puzzle game were  you are being chased by enemies and attempting to finish the dots before being hit by enemies.

There is a glitch on level 1 that the left portal does not work but works for all other levels. Unsure how to fix as I do not have this issue in the editor.

The controls are W,A,S,D and to pull up the pause menu press P there will be a way to exit in the menu.
